description: Let S_5(x) denote the difference in counts of multiples of 5 in the interval [0,x), those with even digit sums in base 4 in one set, those with odd digit sums in base 4 in the other. Then a(n) = (-1)^s_4(n) *(S_5(n) -10*S_5(floor(n/16)) +5*S_5(floor(n/256))), where s_4(n) = A053737(n).
